mdRecord.dcterms:title: Continuation des Amours de P. de Ronsard Vandomois
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ronsard, Pierre de, 1524-1585 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Errata on p. [1] at end and Priviege on p. [2] [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Sixth and last title in volume with: Le bocage de P. de Ronsard ... -- A Paris, 1554. Search by call number to retrieve all titles in the volume. Mosaic binding. The volume is described in "Bibliothèque de feu m. Hector de Backer" pt. 1, no. 391. Bookplates of Baron Jérome Pichon (motto Memor fui dierum antiquoru[m] PS. CXLII) and of Hector de Backer; with unidentified cypher bookplate. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 505. [original]
